title: Social movements based on environment in China

content.question: Facing worsening air pollution and environmental degradation, Chinese citizens have been increasingly organizing in large, informal groups to protest and mobilize for change. This is an example of which of the following?

choices.label: The development of a social movement
The creation of a new political party
The formation of local government councils
The establishment of a nongovernmental organization

content.answer: The development of a social movement

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

topic.text: 4.5: Impact of Social Movements and Interest Groups

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
